last_episode_to_air.name: The Most Beautiful Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: After traveling the world, Serena and Tenten face the challenges that once prohibited them from being together. Upon returning to the Philippines, Serena and Tenten face a new chapter in their lives.

name: Sweet Love
overview: Destiny intertwines the lives of a rich Italian bella and a poor, hardworking Manila boy who are both in search of their true identity.

episodes.name: Sweet Beginning
episodes.overview: In a war-torn country, Alice loses her daughter Monica just after parting ways with her husband, Uge. Unknown to Alice, Monica now lives in Italy as Serena with her adoptive father Roberto and his wife Luciana. Meanwhile, a young orphan named Simon rekindles his hope of having his own family when a couple comes to Buklod Kalinga one day.

episodes.name: Pen Pal
episodes.overview: Simon becomes friends with Serena after sending her a letter of gratitude for the package she sent to the orphans of Buklod Kalinga. However, Serena’s happiness quickly turns into despair when an incident force Melds to leave for good.

episodes.name: Wishes
episodes.overview: Luciana takes on the responsibility of raising Serena to be worthy of being a Marchesa. Meanwhile, the Ibarras adopt Simon and give him the nickname Tenten. A decade later, Serena tells Roberto her wish to visit Askovia.

episodes.name: Hope
episodes.overview: Serena’s hope to find her real family fades when the minister of Askovia informs her that they cannot find the man who turned her over to the soldiers’ camp. Meanwhile, Dodoy suffers a mild stroke, forcing Tenten to use all his savings.

episodes.name: Engagement
episodes.overview: An announcement from Gian Carlo's father will upset Serena.

episodes.name: All The Way
episodes.overview: Tenten readily escorts Sese to the hotel, mistaking her as his client. Later, Sese catches Tenten naked in her room and reports him to the police.

episodes.name: Forgive
episodes.overview: Hearing Taps’ pleas, Serena decides to drop her charges against Tenten. Meanwhile, Serena gets a chance to talk to Mr. Mossman when Alessandro finally located him.

episodes.name: Chase
episodes.overview: To make up for his misbehavior, Tenten agrees to drive Serena to Tagaytay where she will meet Mr. Mossman. However, Mr. Mossman refuses to hear her proposal.  Serena learns later about Marchesa Telecom’s worsening financial crisis, which adds up to her worries.

episodes.name: Memory
episodes.overview: After failing to talk with Mr. Mossman, Serena prepares to go back to Italy but eventually opts to stay for some reason. To Tenten’s surprise, Alessandro soon hires him as Sese’s new driver.

episodes.name: Bonding
episodes.overview: Sese finally gets to see Divisoria when Tenten brings her there to look for a gown she could wear at Mr. Mossman’s party. Meanwhile, Gian Carlo considers going to the Philippines upon learning that Serena cannot go home yet.

episodes.name: Party
episodes.overview: Determined to save her company from downfall, Serena agrees to leave the party with Mr. Mossman in order for them to talk about the proposal. She eventually manages to convince the wealthy businessman to invest in her family’s company, not knowing that Mr. Mossman is orchestrating something against her.

episodes.name: Flashback
episodes.overview: Serena reprimands Tenten for hitting Mr. Mossman and causing the businessman to call off their deal. Upon learning that Gian Carlo announced his family’s intention to help the Marchesas, Serena decides to give him a chance. She goes to Buklod Kalinga later on with hopes of finding his old pen pal Simon.

episodes.name: EyeBall
episodes.overview: Serena arrives at Buklod Kalinga but fails to know Simon’s whereabouts. Soon, Tenten learns from the nuns that his old pen pal Serena dropped by the orphanage earlier and left her address. Despite his initial hesitance, Tenten still goes to Serena’s hotel to finally come face-to-face with his childhood friend.

episodes.name: Surprise
episodes.overview: Feeling anxious, Tenten fails to admit that he is Serena’s old pen pal, Simon. Not long after, he decides to muster the courage to admit the truth through an original song.

episodes.name: Discoveries
episodes.overview: After spending the rest of the night together, Serena asks Tenten to come with her to Visayas, but Tenten turns it down, claiming that he has to work. However, because of his family’s encouragement, Tenten changes his mind and decides to join Serena on her trip.

episodes.name: Bohol
episodes.overview: Serena flies to Visayas with Tenten just to reach Melds’ hometown. Soon, much to her delight, Serena finally reunites with her old nanny.

episodes.name: Firsts
episodes.overview: Serena and Tenten spend their first day in Bohol by indulging in some of the province’s exotic delicacies. Failing to get a good sleep that night, Serena decides to help Tenten correct his speech problem. Meanwhile, Binggoy works at a construction site after receiving no payment for his gig, but later gets into an accident.

episodes.name: Feelings
episodes.overview: Tenten and Serena enjoy a fun day with Melds and Cardo while cruising along the Loboc River. Later, Tenten learns more about Gian Carlo and advises Serena to give her best friend a chance. Meanwhile, Gian Carlo’s father reiterates to Luciana that his son’s marriage to Serena must push through.

episodes.name: Falling For You
episodes.overview: Roberto angers Luciana when he allows Serena to extend her stay in the Philippines. Meanwhile, Serena confronts a group of girls after seeing them ridicule Tenten because of his speech impediment.

episodes.name: PuSo
episodes.overview: With Serena’s help, Tenten overcomes his lisp. He soon realizes that he is falling in love with Serena. Meanwhile, Gian Carlo learns about Tenten.

episodes.name: THIS
episodes.overview: Failing to share a dance with Serena during the festivity, Tenten decides to dance with her afterward under the moonlight. Soon, Serena and Tenten bid Melds a tearful farewell and head back to Manila. While Tenten comes home and surprises everyone with his much-improved speech, Serena receives several bouquets of flowers from Gian Carlo.

episodes.name: DreamGirl
episodes.overview: Failing to keep Serena off his mind, Tenten begins to realize that he is falling in love with her. Soon, Serena arrives at Tenten’s workplace and decides to spend some time with him. Serena also rides a jeepney for the first time.

episodes.name: Meet The Ibarras
episodes.overview: Tenten brings Serena to his home to explain why he wants to work abroad. Taps, Dodoy, and Binggoy then see Serena and welcome her with open arms. Wanting to experience living a normal life, Serena decides to stay for a little while to bond with Tenten’s family and neighbors. Meanwhile, Gian Carlo plans to go to the Philippines to surprise Serena.

episodes.name: Yun Na
episodes.overview: Failing to keep Serena off his mind, Tenten begins to realize that he is falling in love with her.

episodes.name: Date
episodes.overview: Serena agrees to have dinner with Tenten, who plans to confess his feelings for the lady. While Melds, Cardo, and Franco surprise Serena at the hotel, Gian Carlo learns that his flight is indefinitely delayed.

episodes.name: Reality
episodes.overview: Believing that he will be able to tell Serena his true feelings at the end of the day, Tenten suits up and fetches Serena at her hotel for their date. Tenten, however, opts not to confess his feelings anymore as his plans get ruined by unforeseen circumstances.

episodes.name: Basag Trip
episodes.overview: Despite mustering enough courage, Tenten still fails to confess his feelings for Serena upon seeing Gian Carlo inside her hotel room. Tenten then leaves and returns home with a heavy heart, recalling that Serena and Gian Carlo are bound to get married. Meanwhile, Gian Carlo and Serena surprise Melds with the care packages from Italy.

episodes.name: Emo
episodes.overview: Thinking that he has no chance with Serena because of Gian Carlo, Tenten chooses to ignore her phone calls and avoid her at all costs. Tenten even used Anka, his admirer, in order to keep away from Serena.

episodes.name: Iba Na
episodes.overview: While Tenten is losing himself in sadness and desperation, Serena is starting to enjoy Gian Carlo's presence.

episodes.name: Set Up
episodes.overview: Serena wants Tenten to meet Gian Carlo. Is Tenten's heart ready?

episodes.name: Hopia No More
episodes.overview: Serena lets Gian Carlo experience the wonders of Manila by taking him to the places where she and Tenten spent some time together. Despite having the best time with his best friend, Gian Carlo still feels that he is losing Serena to her newfound friend Tenten. Meanwhile, Tenten accepts the fact that he and Serena are only friends.

episodes.name: Ouch
episodes.overview: Serena assumes that Tenten has a problem upon noticing that his speech impediment has returned. Her gut feeling becomes even stronger when Jei Jei informs her that Tenten is in love. Instead of admitting his feelings, Tenten lies to Serena and says that he is brokenhearted because of Anka. Hearing this, Serena decides to help Tenten by setting up a blind date for him.

episodes.name: Double Date
episodes.overview: After reprimanding Tenten for ditching Sarah, Serena is taken aback when he confessed his real feelings for her. Tenten, on the other hand, decides to part ways with Serena knowing that she is already working things out with Gian Carlo.

episodes.name: Pampanga
episodes.overview: While Tenten tries to conceal the anguish he feels from being rejected, Serena begins to fulfill her promise to give Gian Carlo a chance. Just as they try to start anew without one another, Serena and Tenten stumble upon each other at Sarah’s restaurant.

episodes.name: Love Symptoms
episodes.overview: Despite his initial hesitation, Tenten agrees to join Serena and Gian Carlo in a trip to Sarah's resort park. However, Sarah's apparent fondness for Tenten makes Serena uneasy. Meanwhile, Luciana patches things up with Roberto.

episodes.name: Pagputok
episodes.overview: In his attempt to overcome his fear, Tenten ends up in an embarrassing situation while doing a free fall. Meanwhile, Gian Carlo prepares a surprise for Serena, but his hard work comes to nothing when he suddenly gets sick.

episodes.name: Moment of Truth
episodes.overview: As her date with Gian Carlo fails to push through, Serena hangs out with Tenten and manages to patch things up with him. The next morning, Serena is taken aback upon realizing that Sarah spent the night at Tenten’s room.

episodes.name: Say It
episodes.overview: Serena starts feeling awkward around Tenten after realizing that she might be in love with him. Gian Carlo, on the other hand, finally figures out that there is something going on between Tenten and Serena.

episodes.name: The Marchesas
episodes.overview: Gian Carlo fails to hold back his tears upon realizing that he is losing his best friend to another man. Despite this, Gian Carlo decides to fight for his love for Serena and even goes out of his way to make the young lady feel special.

episodes.name: The Invitation
episodes.overview: While Tenten and his family celebrate his decision to return to school, Serena worries about what Gian Carlo may do after she rejected him and revealed her true feelings for Tenten. Later, Luciana and Roberto surprise Serena with their sudden arrival.

episodes.name: The Big Event
episodes.overview: Luciana and Roberto arrive in Manila to surprise Serena. Soon, Tenten meets the Marchesa couple and gets the chance to spend time with them at Sarah's restaurant. However, things turn awkward for everyone after Tenten gets himself drunk.

episodes.name: I Love You
episodes.overview: Much to Serena's surprise, Tenten charms his way through the Marchesa couple's hearts. Failing to hide her fondness for Tenten, Luciana asks Sarah to invite the young man to come with them to a prestigious party.

episodes.name: Mamma Mia
episodes.overview: Serena finds herself mesmerized by Tenten when he arrived at the party clad in an elegant suit. Soon, Tenten sits with the Marchesas and shares his poverty-stricken yet happy life with his adoptive family. Unable to hide his jealousy over Tenten and Serena’s sweetness, Gian Carlo leaves the table and unknowingly draws attention from Luciana.

episodes.name: Challenge
episodes.overview: Tenten finds himself in a humiliating position when Luciana volunteers him to recite passages from a poem before the guests. Serena steps in to save Tenten from further embarrassment and even shocks everyone when she bravely confesses her love for the young man.

episodes.name: Luciana and Dodoy
episodes.overview: Tenten's passionate declaration of love for Serena prompts Luciana and Roberto to invite the Ibarras for dinner. Luciana, however, has more than just getting to know Tenten and his family on her agenda.

episodes.name: Kapit
episodes.overview: Luciana renders Taps insulted after asking her to stay away from Serena in exchange for a huge amount of money. With this, Serena goes to the Ibarras to personally apologize to them. Soon, Serena helps Tenten finish the love song he wants to dedicate to his parents for their wedding anniversary.

episodes.name: Desperado
episodes.overview: Tenten, Binggoy, and Serena surprise Dodoy and Taps with a wedding anniversary party. In the midst of the festivity, Dodoy suddenly experiences severe chest pain, prompting his family to rush him to the hospital. There, the Ibarras learn that Dodoy needs to undergo a heart bypass surgery that costs a million. Serena then begs her mother to help Tenten's family, but Luciana refuses.

episodes.name: The Big Moves
episodes.overview: While the Ibarras struggle to gather enough money for Dodoy’s operation, Roberto informs Serena that he sincerely wants to help Tenten’s family. Taps, however, rejects Roberto’s offer and reiterates that her family will never seek financial help from the Marchesas. Meanwhile, Angela joins a singing competition, hoping to win the prize to help Alice find Monica.

episodes.name: Maling Akala
episodes.overview: A desperate Binggoy approaches Luciana to seek financial help. Just after deciding to stay in the Philippines for good, Serena finds herself in danger at the place where she expects to meet Tenten.

episodes.name: Connection
episodes.overview: Desperate for money, Binggoy ransoms Serena. When Tenten finds out, he initially fights Binggoy's plan. However, when Binggoy's life hangs in the balance, Tenten is left with no choice but to help with his brother's schemes.

episodes.name: Ciao Italia
episodes.overview: Tenten’s explanation falls on deaf ears as Serena refuses to believe that he did not conspire with Binggoy in abducting her. Having no trust for Tenten, Kokoy follows Tenten and Serena and causes a horrendous accident. Meanwhile, Taps is filled with hope upon learning that a foundation paid for Dodoy’s heart bypass surgery. Unbeknownst to Taps, Luciana is the one who financed the operation to pay Binggoy for kidnapping Serena.

episodes.name: Begin Again
episodes.overview: Determined to do the right thing, Tenten informs Luciana that Binggoy is the one who kidnapped Serena. Pretending to be surprised with this revelation, Luciana pledges not to file a case against them but orders Tenten to stay away from Serena. To appease a brokenhearted Tenten, Binggoy sends his brother’s composition to the songwriting competition Himig Handog P-Pop Love Songs. After learning that his song was accepted, Tenten goes to the office of Star Records, where he meets Angel.

episodes.name: Venezia
episodes.overview: Serena learns that Roberto is in critical condition but struggles to remember anything about her father. Luciana then tells Serena about the life she had before she got amnesia. Meanwhile, in her attempt to make it up to Tenten, Angel brings him to a karaoke bar.

episodes.name: Reality Bites
episodes.overview: With the success of the song “Mundong ‘Di Magkatagpo,” Tenten and Angel make their mark in the music industry. Unable to find inspiration in writing new songs, Tenten flies to Paris for a music summit but finds himself in Italy when his flight made an emergency landing in Venice. Meanwhile, Serena starts anew with Gian Carlo and soon becomes comfortable around him again.

episodes.name: Search
episodes.overview: While exploring Italy, Tenten unexpectedly runs into Serena. However, nothing comes out of their meeting as Gian Carlo finally proposes to Serena.

episodes.name: Coming Home
episodes.overview: Tenten opens his heart for Angel, but what if Serena returns to the Philippines?

episodes.name: Salubong
episodes.overview: In Manila, Serena searches for people and places that can help her regain her memories.

episodes.name: The Song
episodes.overview: Eager to search for her forgotten identity, Serena goes to the Philippines in secret. Meanwhile, Tenten reconnects to his family and friends, and finally decides to open his heart to Angel.

episodes.name: One Call Away
episodes.overview: After browsing Serena's Instagram account, Angel secretly sends her long-lost sister a message and unexpectedly receives a reply. Serena agrees to meet up with Angel after wandering aimlessly around the streets of Manila and almost crossing paths with Tenten.

episodes.name: Meant To Be
episodes.overview: Angel finally meets Serena and brings her to a bar where she performs her hit song "Magkabilang Mundo." Serena unwittingly sings along and later remembers meeting the song's composer upon hearing Tenten's name from Angel.

episodes.name: Forgotten
episodes.overview: Serena's indifference toward Tenten bothers him greatly, until he finds out that she has lost her memories.

episodes.name: It's All Coming Back
episodes.overview: Serena is rushed to the hospital because of an upset stomach, and she ends up staying at the Urtolas for the night. Serena gets to know her biological family better, and unknowingly reconnects with Tenten through a phone call.

episodes.name: Family Feud
episodes.overview: As Angel convinces Serena to meet their relatives, she gets Tenten to attend the family reunion as well. In a turn of fate, Serena and Tenten go to the same store to prepare for the gathering. Tenten sees Serena, chases after her, and finally learns of Serena's relation to the Urtolas.

episodes.name: Bawi
episodes.overview: Tenten comes to a decision of telling Angel the truth about who he is in Serena's forgotten past.

episodes.name: White Lies
episodes.overview: Upon coming home from the Urtolas' party, Tenten reveals to Dodoy and Taps that Serena is Angel’s long-lost sister. Learning that Serena has amnesia, Dodoy and Taps try to encourage Tenten to help Serena remember her past. Tenten, however, refuses to do so, leaving his parents puzzled.

episodes.name: The Plan
episodes.overview: Hearing Tenten's newest composition drives Serena into a severe emotional turmoil that worries everyone around her. This incident pushes Tenten to decide on confessing the truth behind Serena's condition, but Binggoy goes home just to stop Tenten from doing so.

episodes.name: FirefLIEs
episodes.overview: Dodoy punishes his sons by sending them to jail. As he and Binggoy exert effort to regain their father’s trust, Tenten comes to a decision of telling Angel the truth about who he is in Serena's forgotten past.

episodes.name: Stolen Memory
episodes.overview: After learning of Serena’s forgotten past, Angel plans to reveal the truth to her sister. However, Alice urges Angel to keep mum in order to protect their family.

episodes.name: Tuko
episodes.overview: A new opportunity comes along Angel and Tenten’s way when they receive an offer to do an album as a duo. Upon learning about her sister’s upcoming provincial tours with Tenten, Serena decides to join them and even urges the entire Urtola clan to tag along—a move that alarms Alice.

episodes.name: Memory Spark
episodes.overview: Serena retrieves indistinct memories upon hearing “Ang Suso” and after seeing a local drum and lyre corps in Angel’s provincial tour. Tenten, on the other hand, strives to avoid Serena as Alice wishes.

episodes.name: Panaginip
episodes.overview: Jei Jei creates a plan to trigger Serena's memories by bringing everyone to a resort where fireflies abound. The plan fails, but Serena recounts firefly stories from Luciana and Gian Carlo, surprising Tenten because he was edited out of the retelling. That night, however, Serena spots a firefly that leads her to Tenten.

episodes.name: Sa Totoo Lang
episodes.overview: Jei Jei successfully scares Serena out of her room, leading her to seek Tenten’s help in the middle of the night. After recalling a similar situation in the past, Tenten calms Serena with the same words she told him before. The next day, Serena surprises everyone with her sudden desire to go to Bohol.

episodes.name: Scar
episodes.overview: Serena learns about Tenten's nickname, and becomes curious about it after being mentioned by Gian Carlo before. Soon, Serena becomes alarmed when she starts imagining herself in Angel's place around Tenten. Seeing Serena struggle, in turn, makes Alice feel guilty for keeping the truth from her daughter.

episodes.name: The Farm
episodes.overview: Despite their intentions to keep away from each other, Tenten and Serena find themselves composing a love song together in the middle of the night. Meanwhile, Uge calls for an emergency family meeting regarding Serena's situation.

episodes.name: Bistado
episodes.overview: Tenten summons all his courage to break up with Angel and to admit that he still loves Serena. Serena, on the other hand, begins suspecting that her family is hiding something from her.

episodes.name: This Is It
episodes.overview: Angel's breakdown compels Uge to ask Tenten to keep his distance from his daughters and from matters concerning only the Urtolas. On the other hand, Serena decides to talk to Tenten without her family's knowledge, after learning from her psychiatrist that he may have something to do with her forgotten past.

episodes.name: All Out
episodes.overview: The Ibarras take Serena to their farm, where she gets to learn more about Tenten from his family. Upon learning about the situation, Tenten sets aside his meeting with Angel and hastily follows his family in fear of the truth being known by Serena already. Angel, in turn, struggles to heal her broken heart.

episodes.name: Face The Fear
episodes.overview: Just as when Serena finally gets the opportunity to ask Tenten about the indescribable attachment she feels towards him, Angel discovers that Serena is with the Ibarras and immediately informs their parents about it. Soon, Uge’s phone calls not only interrupt Serena and Tenten’s conversation but also remind Tenten to leave the task of revealing the truth to the Urtolas.

episodes.name: Search For Answers
episodes.overview: Alice and Uge gather the rest of their family as they finally decide to tell Serena about her past. Serena, however, is stranded with Tenten, and being with him agitates her to ask him for the truth, which Tenten can no longer hide. At the same time, Gian Carlo and Luciana discover that Serena is in the Philippines.

episodes.name: Dreaming Of You
episodes.overview: Frustrated that her own family lied to her hurts Serena more than the truth, and she decides to go back to Italy immediately. Tenten, however, refuses to leave the situation ending badly and rushes to follow her to the airport.

episodes.name: Close To You
episodes.overview: Even after hearing Tenten's pleas, Serena remains firm on her decision to return to Italy. While Tenten comes home with a heavy heart, Serena confronts Luciana and calls off her engagement with Gian Carlo.

episodes.name: TLC
episodes.overview: Determined to remember everything about her past, Serena returns to the Philippines, much to the Ibarras' surprise. While Tenten is more than happy to walk her through her forgotten memories, Serena makes it clear that she does not intend to rekindle any flame with him.

episodes.name: Win Back The Love
episodes.overview: Serena shares an emotional reunion with the Urtolas when she came home and apologized to them. Tenten, on the other hand, sets aside his regrets and musters enough courage to volunteer in helping Serena find herself.

episodes.name: Ganda Problems
episodes.overview: Serena takes Tenten's offer and agrees to relive their previous romance in hopes of triggering her lost memories. Meanwhile, Luciana begins to think of her current problems as punishment for what she has done in the past. Taps returns to Buklod Kalinga and finds a woman looking for a child left in the orphanage years ago.

episodes.name: Battle Of The Exes
episodes.overview: After witnessing Serena doing everything uncharacteristic of her, Tenten soon learns how much she just wants to break free from the shadow of her past and of everyone telling her what to be. Meanwhile, Taps sees the picture of the baby that Mrs. Lorenzo is looking for. Luciana contacts the person she hired to look for her child.

episodes.name: The Race
episodes.overview: Gian Carlo follows Serena to the Philippines to beg her for a second chance, only to find Tenten in Serena's hotel room. Despite his pleas falling on deaf ears, Gian Carlo makes it clear to Tenten that Serena is better off without him. Meanwhile, Luciana's search for her son continues.

episodes.name: Manibugho
episodes.overview: Serena's plan to make her Bohol trip a solo journey to find herself ceases when Tenten and Gian Carlo insist on accompanying her to the province. Meanwhile, the Urtolas and the Ibarras meet in hopes of addressing and settling the Tenten-Serena issue at hand.

episodes.name: Urong Sulong
episodes.overview: The Urtolas and Ibarras finally settle the issue about Binggoy's involvement in Serena's past. On the other hand, Serena continues to struggle with her memories despite Melds' efforts to recall them. Meanwhile, the rivalry between Gian Carlo and Tenten continues.

episodes.name: Strategy
episodes.overview: Gian Carlo wins all the festival games against Tenten, only to realize that Tenten might have gotten the upper hand in the bigger competition between them. Meanwhile, Angel takes a step in moving on from her recent heartbreak.

episodes.name: If Only
episodes.overview: While Gian Carlo and Tenten continue to vie for Serena's heart, another development brews between Angel and Binggoy as they find themselves under similar situations. Meanwhile, Taps gets deeper into Mrs. Lorenzo's search for her son.

episodes.name: Kaba Feels
episodes.overview: Gian Carlo takes a chance on winning Serena's heart by planning to serenade her, only to learn that Serena is not at home. Serena, meanwhile, is taken to a village dance where she finds Tenten waiting for her.

episodes.name: HHWW
episodes.overview: Opting not to back down from his fight for Serena’s heart, Gian Carlo serenades her with an Italian love song. Despite being discouraged by his rival's move, Tenten decides on the ultimate strategy in hopes of making Serena remember their past romance. Meanwhile, Roberto shows signs of recovering.

episodes.name: The Decision
episodes.overview: Tenten's sudden leave angers Serena, until news that he may be badly hurt in a bus accident reaches Manibugho. As it turns out, Tenten is fine, but the incident makes Serena realize what she really feels for him. Meanwhile, Binggoy and Uge come to a conclusion that Taps and Alice are keeping a secret.

episodes.name: Just Say Yes
episodes.overview: Serena and Tenten are back in each other's arms after Serena finally admits her real feelings for Tenten. Gian Carlo initially takes it like a man, until Buboy's goading unleashes all of Gian Carlo's pain and heartache out of him.

episodes.name: Fight For It
episodes.overview: Tenten and Serena return to Manila and happily tell their loved ones that they have gotten back together. Elsewhere, a brokenhearted Gian Carlo drowns his sorrows in alcohol, while his uncle, Fabio, vows to take revenge on the people who caused his nephew such pain.

episodes.name: Target
episodes.overview: Serena and Binggoy finally reconcile after she gives him a chance to make up for what he did. Meanwhile, Tenten cooks up a romantic surprise for Serena, who gets the wrong impression that Tenten is trying to ask for her hand in marriage. Elsewhere, Fabio finds a bruised Gian Carlo in jail.

episodes.name: Warning
episodes.overview: Serena and Binggoy finally reconcile after she gives him a chance to make up for what he did. Meanwhile, Tenten cooks up a romantic surprise for Serena, who gets the wrong impression that Tenten is trying to ask for her hand in marriage. Elsewhere, Fabio finds a bruised Gian Carlo in jail.

episodes.name: Gut Feeling
episodes.overview: Upon learning why Tenten is giving her the cold shoulder, Serena makes a decisive move that shows just how much she loves him. Meanwhile, Fabio goads Gian Carlo on to challenging his own destiny and fighting for his love.

episodes.name: Sacrifice
episodes.overview: Tenten brings Serena to Buklod Kalinga where they meet an aloof orphan named Motmot, who reminds Tenten of his younger self. Meanwhile, Favio urges Gian Carlo to get rid of Tenten by murdering him. Gian Carlo, however, has something else in mind.

episodes.name: Bye Binggoy
episodes.overview: After learning that Serena is being followed, the Ibarras and Urtolas suspect that Luciana may have something up her sleeve, especially upon learning that she is in Manila. Luciana, however, only warns Serena about the wrath of the De Lucas and apologizes to Binggoy for having to play villain again if he wants to protect his family.

episodes.name: Blackmail
episodes.overview: The Urtolas and the Ibarras find time to unwind despite the threat posed by the De Lucas. Meanwhile, Luciana becomes extremely devastated after discovering that her son has been dead for years already.

episodes.name: Ultimatum
episodes.overview: Binggoy, Tenten, and Serena’s trip takes an unexpected turn when their vehicle swerves off the road after dodging a fast approaching truck. While Tenten and Serena remain unharmed, Binggoy is mortally wounded.

episodes.name: Wedding Prep
episodes.overview: Emotions flow as the Ibarras, the Urtolas, and their friends bid farewell to Binggoy. Amid his grief, Tenten grows more resentful of Luciana upon learning that she manipulated Binggoy to break him and Serena apart.

episodes.name: Dilemma
episodes.overview: Tenten is consumed by anger when Serena admits Gian Carlo’s possible involvement in Binggoy’s death. Gian Carlo, on the other hand, pressures Serena into marrying him in exchange for Tenten’s safety.

episodes.name: Wedding Day
episodes.overview: On the day of her wedding, Serena makes the ultimate sacrifice and flees from Tenten to keep him safe from Gian Carlo. While Tenten tries to heal his broken heart, Serena attempts to get used to her new life in Italy.

episodes.name: Change Is Coming
episodes.overview: Vivian Dubois, an incredibly wealthy woman, introduces herself as Tenten’s biological mother. She brings a huge change in the Ibarras’ lives when she bequeaths all of her assets to Tenten. Meanwhile, Roberto finally wakes up but fails to stop Serena and Gian Carlo’s wedding.

episodes.name: Forever Is Not Enough
episodes.overview: Serena and Gian Carlo’s wedding ends in a disaster when a group of men gun down Favio and Gian Carlo. Following their family's bankruptcy, Serena and Roberto start anew in the countryside. However, when Serena learns that Villa Marchesa is set to be demolished, she finds a way to meet with the new owner, who turns out to be the person she least expects.

episodes.name: Changed Man
episodes.overview: Along with the shocking revelation that Tenten is the new owner of Villa Marchesa, Serena notices how her ex-boyfriend has drastically changed ever since he met his biological mother. Despite this, Serena remains determined to change Tenten's mind about demolishing Villa Marchesa, but her pleas fall on deaf ears. Dodoy and Taps then come up with a way to help Serena by taking Tenten to the Marchesa farm.

episodes.name: Pusong Bato
episodes.overview: Stunned by the Ibarras’ unexpected appearance, Serena nevertheless uses their time together to try to convince Tenten to call off his plans to demolish Villa Marchesa. However, Tenten remains firm in his decision. Moments before his return to Manila, Tenten crosses paths with Luciana.

episodes.name: Arrival
episodes.overview: After the court denied Serena’s request for a temporary restraining order (TRO) to postpone Villa Marchesa’s demolition, Serena returns to the Philippines in hopes of changing Tenten’s mind. Meanwhile, Tenten plots to exact his revenge on Luciana.

episodes.name: Power Play
episodes.overview: Tenten sabotages Serena's attempts to have a word with him. Meanwhile, Luciana looks after Roberto while Serena is away.

episodes.name: Fighting Spirit
episodes.overview: Tenten continues to impair Serena's attempts to talk to him in order to compel Luciana to return to the Philippines. However, in a chance meeting with Serena, Taps discovers Tenten's misdeeds.

episodes.name: Patigasan
episodes.overview: Due to Taps' persuasion, Tenten gives Serena a chance to present her proposal for Villa Marchesa. However, Tenten fails to show up in his and Serena's meeting after attending an important business trip. Meanwhile, Luciana deems it the right time to go back to the Philippines to face Tenten.

episodes.name: Aminan
episodes.overview: Serena finally gets the chance to talk to Tenten and explain why she ran away on their wedding day. Meanwhile, the authorities take Luciana into custody as soon as she arrives in the Philippines.

episodes.name: Connivance
episodes.overview: While Luciana awaits her fate, Serena tries to convince Tenten and his family that Luciana had nothing to do with Binggoy's death. Luciana later manages to get out of jail and meet up with an old friend.

episodes.name: Lost And Found
episodes.overview: Luciana thanks Vivian for helping her regain her freedom and for taking care of her long-lost son. Meanwhile, River offers his grandparents' rest house in exchange for Tenten's help in finding his dream girl.

episodes.name: Sabotage
episodes.overview: River finally meets Serena and wastes no time in asking her out. On the hand, Tenten becomes restless after learning of River's interest in Serena.

episodes.name: The Game Plan
episodes.overview: Tenten receives an offer that turns the tables between him and Serena, finally giving her the upper hand on him. Meanwhile, Julio reveals a new information about the connection between Luciana and the De Lucas.

episodes.name: Ex Deal
episodes.overview: Tenten makes a deal with Serena in exchange for Villa Marchesa. Meanwhile, Luciana pleads not guilty to the murder of Binggoy.

episodes.name: Payback
episodes.overview: Serena continues to make it difficult for Tenten to reach her. Noticing their son's worsening behavior, Taps and Dodoy reach out to Serena.

episodes.name: True Feelings
episodes.overview: Tenten's reaction to Serena and River's date inspires the Ibarras to think of a plan that will bring the old Tenten back. Meanwhile, Roberto and Luciana receive a strange greeting on their way to the Cruzes' rest house.

episodes.name: Paranoid
episodes.overview: Serena blames Tenten for the threat on Luciana's life. Meanwhile, the Ibarra family comes up with a plan to bring Tenten and Serena together as they continue with Operation 1010.

episodes.name: Operation 1010
episodes.overview: The Ibarra family, with the help of Uge and Roberto, successfully brings Tenten and Serena together in one family vacation as they proceed with Operation 1010.

episodes.name: Sabwatan
episodes.overview: Serena and Tenten start to warm up to each other during their family vacation. Meanwhile, Luciana gets haunted by a dark part of her past after receiving another threat.

episodes.name: Parents Trap
episodes.overview: Serena and Tenten finally agree to maintain a peaceful relationship with each other for the sake of their families. Meanwhile, the Ibarra family celebrates the success of Operation 1010.

episodes.name: Pa-fall
episodes.overview: After hearing Serena's and Luciana's statements at the court hearing, Tenten becomes uncertain in his decision to pursue the case against Luciana.

episodes.name: Family Day
episodes.overview: Tenten discovers Vivian's secret, while Serena turns suspicious of Hannah. Meanwhile, Favio realizes Luciana's motive for ordering for his and Gian Carlo's assassination.

episodes.name: Truth
episodes.overview: With Serena's warning in mind, Tenten tries to figure out Hannah's secret by spending time with her. Meanwhile, upon receiving another suspicious call, Luciana finally meets the man behind the threats.

episodes.name: Hot Seat
episodes.overview: Favio threatens to expose Luciana's secret to Tenten if she does not meet his demands. After discovering Hannah's secret, Tenten finally learns that Favio is alive.

episodes.name: Busted
episodes.overview: Serena wonders why Tenten gives her the cold shoulder, unaware that he is gearing up for a big announcement for her on Taps and Dodoy’s wedding anniversary celebration. At the same time, Hannah and Favio plan to ruin Tenten and Serena’s special night with an unpleasant surprise.

episodes.name: Lure
episodes.overview: Tenten's sweet surprise for Serena turns sour when Favio exposes one of Luciana's secrets during Taps and Dodoy's wedding anniversary celebration.

episodes.name: At Last
episodes.overview: Tenten finally discovers Hannah's secret.

episodes.name: The Big Surprise
episodes.overview: While Tenten is busy planning a big surprise for Serena, Favio makes sure to expose an even bigger revelation.

episodes.name: Expose
episodes.overview: Tenten's sweet surprise for Serena turns sour when Favio exposes one of Luciana's secrets during Taps and Dodoy's wedding anniversary celebration.

episodes.name: Secret No More
episodes.overview: Upon discovering Vivian and Luciana’s connection, Serena and Tenten finally learn about Luciana’s deepest secret. Meanwhile, Hannah executes her plan to help Favio escape from the authorities.

episodes.name: May Forever Ba Talaga
episodes.overview: Realizing Serena's importance in his life amidst the various complications that comes with loving her, Tenten finally decides to follow his heart.

episodes.name: The Most Beautiful Finale
episodes.overview: After traveling the world, Serena and Tenten face the challenges that once prohibited them from being together. Upon returning to the Philippines, Serena and Tenten face a new chapter in their lives.
